org.aludratest.util.timeout
Class TimeoutService

java.lang.Object
  org.aludratest.util.timeout.TimeoutService

public class TimeoutService
extends Object

Performs Java invocations applying a timeout.

Author:
Volker Bergmann

Nested Class Summary
static class TimeoutService.CallableWithTimeout<E>
          Wraps another Callable applying a timeout to the invocation of Callable.call().

Constructor Detail

TimeoutService

public TimeoutService()
Method Detail

call

public static <T> T call(Callable<T> callable,
                         long timeout)
              throws Exception
Performs the invocation and throws a TimeoutException if the invocation time exceeds the specified timeout.

Parameters:
callable - the Callable to call
timeout - the maximum tolerated execution time in milliseconds
Returns:
the result of the callable's Callable.call() method invocation
Throws:
Exception

createCallableWithTimeout

public static <T> Callable<T> createCallableWithTimeout(Callable<T> target,
                                                        long timeout)
Creates a Callable that wraps a target object of type Callable, forwarding the invocation of its own Callable.call() method to the targets call method and applying a timeout. If the timeout is exceeded, a TimeoutException is thrown.

Parameters:
target - the target to wrap and forward calls to
timeout - the timeout to apply on target invocation
Returns:
the result of the target's Callable.call() invocation
